text: Alhambra is a city in the west part of San Gabriel Valley, Los Angeles County, California. It is about east of Downtown Los Angeles. It was incorporated on July 11, 1903. At the 2020 census, 82,868 people lived there. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California Category:1900s establishments in California Category:1903 establishments in the United States
title: Alhambra, California
